message: Rule applicable: geq_to_ineq ([("Minion", 4100)]), to expression: (Max([a, b]) >= 2), resulting in: Ineq(2, Max([a, b]), 0)
Rule applicable: max_to_var ([("Base", 100)]), to expression: Max([a, b]), resulting in: __0
Rule applicable: sum_eq_to_sumeq ([("Minion", 4400)]), to expression: (x = Sum([Max([a, b]), 1])), resulting in: SumEq([Max([a, b]), 1], x)
Rule applicable: sumeq_to_minion ([("Minion", 4400)]), to expression: SumEq([Max([a, b]), 1], x), resulting in: And([SumGeq([Max([a, b]), 1], x), SumLeq([Max([a, b]), 1], x)])
Rule applicable: max_to_var ([("Base", 100)]), to expression: Max([a, b]), resulting in: __1
Rule applicable: max_to_var ([("Base", 100)]), to expression: Max([a, b]), resulting in: __2
